nodes.text: Karastace Gonn was a male Human General who served the Galactic Republic during the Great Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire.
During the Great Galactic War, Karastace Gonn had been a thorn in the Empire's side, preventing Imperial forces from being able to conquer fringe systems.

Early during the Galactic War, Karastace had been gathering Imperials within the ranks of Imperial Intelligence to defect to the Republic at a secret hideout on Nar Shaddaa. Karastace was successful, but Darth Baras had learned that Gonn was to meet with a some of these traitors on the moon. He sent his apprentice to eliminate Gonn and Imperial mole Fawste. Gonn and his troops fought against the Sith Warrior and were all killed.
